long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revamp your browsing experience with the NaviSnake browser extension! This add-on transforms your standard new tab page into a dynamic and engaging homepage featuring a built-in Snake game. Our key features include:

- A nostalgic game of snake, have fun and take a quick stopgap from work or browsing. 
- Handy links to popular websites, conveniently placed for access after game sessions.
- A seamless web search experience powered by Bing.com, allowing you to effortlessly explore your favorite topics, images, videos, and news.

By clicking NaviSnake, I accept and agree to installing NaviSnake Extension and setting the New tab to https://www.bing.com is that provided by Microsoft Bing, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

For more information, please visit:
- About Us: https://navisnake.stopgap.cc/aboutus.html
- Contact Us: https://navisnake.stopgap.cc/contactus.html
- Terms and Conditions: https://navisnake.stopgap.cc/termsandconditions.html
- EULA: https://navisnake.stopgap.cc/eula.html
- Privacy Policy: https://navisnake.stopgap.cc/privacypolicy.html

Data Collection Notice:
Our service may collect Personal, Usage, and Search Data, which is stored anonymously to enhance your experience and improve our service. Detailed information is available in our Privacy Policy.
